tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_components AS SELECT c.amp_activity_id, c.title AS title, c.amp_component_id AS amp_component_id, f.rep_organization_id AS component_rep_org_id, f.component_second_rep_org_id AS component_second_rep_org_id, c.type AS component_type_id FROM amp_components c LEFT JOIN amp_component_funding f ON c.amp_component_id = f.amp_component_id WHERE c.component_status IN ( SELECT acv.id FROM amp_category_class acc JOIN amp_category_value acv ON acv.amp_category_class_id = acc.id WHERE acc.keyname = 'component_status' AND acv.category_value <> 'Rejected' );
